entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023
